name: m365-meeting-details-kpi-reports-prompt
title: Analyze Calendars and Chats and Give KPIs for Reporting
shortDescription: Analyze Calendars and Emails, Chats, and KPIs for Reporting for Team Members
longDescription: This is a prompt that will analyze users that have shared calendars with you and provide a summary of their meetings and then review email and chat correspondence with summary.

thumbnails.alt: Analyze Calendars and Chats and Give KPIs for Reporting
